21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.capture;
24  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.createNiceMock;
25  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.eq;
26  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expect;
27  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.replay;
28  import static org.opencastproject.index.service.util.CatalogAdapterUtil.getCatalogProperties;
29  
30  import org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api.AssetManager;
31  import org.opencastproject.assetmanager.api.Snapshot;
32  import org.opencastproject.capture.CaptureParameters;
33  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.ElasticsearchIndex;
34  import org.opencastproject.elasticsearch.index.objects.event.Event;
35  import org.opencastproject.index.service.api.IndexService;
36  import org.opencastproject.index.service.catalog.adapter.events.CommonEventCatalogUIAdapter;
37  import org.opencastproject.index.service.exception.IndexServiceException;
38  import org.opencastproject.ingest.api.IngestService;
39  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.Catalog;
40  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackage;
41  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackageBuilder;
42  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackageBuilderFactory;
43  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.MediaPackageElementFlavor;
44  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.Publication;
45  import org.opencastproject.mediapackage.PublicationImpl;
46  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.EventCatalogUIAdapter;
47  import org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore.MetadataList;
48  import org.opencastproject.scheduler.api.SchedulerService;
49  import org.opencastproject.scheduler.api.TechnicalMetadata;
50  import org.opencastproject.scheduler.api.TechnicalMetadataImpl;
51  import org.opencastproject.security.api.DefaultOrganization;
52  import org.opencastproject.security.api.Organization;
53  import org.opencastproject.security.api.SecurityService;
54  import org.opencastproject.security.api.UnauthorizedException;
55  import org.opencastproject.util.MimeType;
56  import org.opencastproject.util.NotFoundException;
57  import org.opencastproject.util.PropertiesUtil;
58  import org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowService;
59  
60  import com.entwinemedia.fn.data.Opt;
61  
62  import org.easymock.Capture;
63  import org.easymock.EasyMock;
64  
65  import java.io.InputStream;
66  import java.net.URI;
67  import java.time.Instant;
68  import java.util.Collections;
69  import java.util.Date;
70  import java.util.Hashtable;
71  import java.util.Map;
72  import java.util.Properties;
73  
74  import javax.ws.rs.Path;
75  
76  @Path("/")
77  public class TestEventsEndpoint extends EventsEndpoint {
78    public static final String DELETE_CATALOG_TYPE = "deletecatalog";
79    public static final String DELETE_EVENT_METADATA = "deleteeventmetdata";
80    public static final String ENGAGE_PUBLICATION_ID = "engage-id";
81    public static final String INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR_TYPE = "internalservererror";
82    public static final String METADATA_CATALOG_TYPE = "extra";
83    public static final String MISSING_ID = "missing";
84    public static final String NO_PUBLICATIONS_EVENT = "nopublications";
85    public static final String NOT_FOUND_TYPE = "notfoundcatalog";
86    public static final String OAIPMH_PUBLICATION_ID = "oaipmh-id";
87    public static final String TWO_PUBLICATIONS = "twopublications";
88    public static final String UNAUTHORIZED_TYPE = "unauthorizedcatalog";
89    public static final String UPDATE_EVENT = "updateevent";
90    public static final String METADATA_UPDATE_EVENT = "metadataupdateevent";
91    public static final String METADATA_GET_EVENT = "metadatagetevent";
92    public static final String SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT = "schedulinggetevent";
93    public static final String SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT = "schedulingupdateevent";
94    public static final String TRACK_UPDATE_EVENT = "trackupdateevent";
95  
96    private static Capture<MetadataList> capturedMetadataList1;
97    private static Capture<MetadataList> capturedMetadataList2;
98    private static Capture<Opt<Date>> capturedStartDate;
99    private static Capture<Opt<Date>> capturedEndDate;
100   private static Capture<Opt<String>> capturedAgentId;
101   private static Capture<Opt<Map<String, String>>> capturedAgentConfig;
102   private static Capture<MediaPackage> capturedMediaPackage;
103 
104   private static Organization defaultOrg = new DefaultOrganization();
105 
106   private void setupSecurityService() {
107     // Prepare mocked security service
108     SecurityService securityService = createNiceMock(SecurityService.class);
109     expect(securityService.getOrganization()).andStubReturn(defaultOrg);
110 
111     // Replay mocked objects
112     replay(securityService);
113 
114     setSecurityService(securityService);
115   }
116 
117   public TestEventsEndpoint() throws Exception {
118     this.endpointBaseUrl = "https://api.opencast.org";
119 
120     ElasticsearchIndex elasticsearchIndex = new ElasticsearchIndex();
121 
122     IndexService indexService = EasyMock.createMock(IndexService.class);
123     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(MISSING_ID, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.<Event> none()).anyTimes();
124 
125     SchedulerService schedulerService = EasyMock.createMock(SchedulerService.class);
126 
127     IngestService ingestService = EasyMock.createMock(IngestService.class);
128 
129     AssetManager assetManager = EasyMock.createMock(AssetManager.class);
130 
131     WorkflowService workflowService = EasyMock.createNiceMock(WorkflowService.class);
132 
133     /**
134      * Setup CommonEventCatalog
135      */
136     CommonEventCatalogUIAdapter commonEventCatalogUIAdapter = new CommonEventCatalogUIAdapter();
137     Properties episodeCatalogProperties = getCatalogProperties(getClass(), "/episode-catalog.properties");
138     commonEventCatalogUIAdapter.updated(PropertiesUtil.toDictionary(episodeCatalogProperties));
139     addCatalogUIAdapter(commonEventCatalogUIAdapter);
140     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getCommonEventCatalogUIAdapter())
141         .andReturn(commonEventCatalogUIAdapter).anyTimes();
142 
143     /**
144      * Setup catalog to be deleted.
145      */
146     EventCatalogUIAdapter deleteAdapter = EasyMock.createMock(EventCatalogUIAdapter.class);
147     EasyMock.expect(deleteAdapter.getFlavor()).andReturn(new MediaPackageElementFlavor(DELETE_CATALOG_TYPE, "episode"))
148         .anyTimes();
149     EasyMock.expect(deleteAdapter.getOrganization()).andReturn(defaultOrg.getId()).anyTimes();
150     EasyMock.expect(deleteAdapter.handlesOrganization(EasyMock.eq(defaultOrg.getId()))).andReturn(true).anyTimes();
151     EasyMock.expect(deleteAdapter.getFields(EasyMock.anyObject(MediaPackage.class))).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
152     EasyMock.expect(deleteAdapter.getUITitle()).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
153     EasyMock.replay(deleteAdapter);
154     addCatalogUIAdapter(deleteAdapter);
155 
156     /**
157      * Delete Metadata external service mocking
158      */
159     Event deleteMetadataEvent = new Event(DELETE_EVENT_METADATA, defaultOrg.getId());
160     MediaPackage deleteMetadataMP = EasyMock.createMock(MediaPackage.class);
161     Catalog deleteCatalog1 = EasyMock.createMock(Catalog.class);
162     EasyMock.expect(deleteMetadataMP.getCatalogs(new MediaPackageElementFlavor(DELETE_CATALOG_TYPE, "episode")))
163             .andReturn(new Catalog[] { deleteCatalog1 }).anyTimes();
164     deleteMetadataMP.remove(deleteCatalog1);
165     EasyMock.expectLastCall().anyTimes();
166 
167     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(DELETE_EVENT_METADATA, elasticsearchIndex))
168             .andReturn(Opt.some(deleteMetadataEvent)).anyTimes();
169     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(deleteMetadataEvent)).andReturn(deleteMetadataMP).anyTimes();
170 
171     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(deleteMetadataEvent,
172             new MediaPackageElementFlavor(DELETE_CATALOG_TYPE, "episode"));
173     EasyMock.expectLastCall().anyTimes();
174 
175     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(deleteMetadataEvent,
176             new MediaPackageElementFlavor(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR_TYPE, "episode"));
177     EasyMock.expectLastCall().andThrow(new IndexServiceException("Problem removing catalog")).anyTimes();
178 
179     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(deleteMetadataEvent, new MediaPackageElementFlavor(NOT_FOUND_TYPE, "episode"));
180     EasyMock.expectLastCall().andThrow(new NotFoundException("Problem finding catalog")).anyTimes();
181 
182     indexService.removeCatalogByFlavor(deleteMetadataEvent,
183             new MediaPackageElementFlavor(UNAUTHORIZED_TYPE, "episode"));
184     EasyMock.expectLastCall().andThrow(new UnauthorizedException("User isn't authorized!")).anyTimes();
185 
186     /**
187      * Get Publications external service mocking
188      */
189     // No Pubs
190     Event noPublicationsEvent = new Event(NO_PUBLICATIONS_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
191     MediaPackage noPublicationsMP = EasyMock.createMock(MediaPackage.class);
192     EasyMock.expect(noPublicationsMP.getPublications()).andReturn(new Publication[] {}).anyTimes();
193     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(NO_PUBLICATIONS_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex))
194             .andReturn(Opt.some(noPublicationsEvent)).anyTimes();
195     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(noPublicationsEvent)).andReturn(noPublicationsMP).anyTimes();
196     // Two Pubs
197     Event twoPublicationsEvent = new Event(TWO_PUBLICATIONS, defaultOrg.getId());
198     MediaPackage twoPublicationsMP = EasyMock.createMock(MediaPackage.class);
199     Publication paellaPublication = new PublicationImpl(ENGAGE_PUBLICATION_ID, "EVENTS.EVENTS.DETAILS.PUBLICATIONS.ENGAGE",
200             new URI("http://mh-allinone.localdomain/paella/ui/watch.html?id=af1a51ce-fb61-4dae-9d5a-f85b9e4fcc99"),
201             MimeType.mimeType("not", "used"));
202     Publication oaipmh = new PublicationImpl(OAIPMH_PUBLICATION_ID, "oaipmh",
203             new URI("http://mh-allinone.localdomain/oaipmh/default?verb=ListMetadataFormats&identifier=af1a51ce-fb61-4dae-9d5a-f85b9e4fcc99"),
204             MimeType.mimeType("not", "used"));
205     EasyMock.expect(twoPublicationsMP.getPublications()).andReturn(new Publication[] { paellaPublication, oaipmh })
206             .anyTimes();
207     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(TWO_PUBLICATIONS, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(twoPublicationsEvent))
208             .anyTimes();
209     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(twoPublicationsEvent)).andReturn(twoPublicationsMP).anyTimes();
210 
211     /**
212      * Update event external service mocking
213      */
214     capturedMetadataList1 = Capture.newInstance();
215     Event updateEvent = new Event(UPDATE_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
216     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(UPDATE_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(updateEvent)).anyTimes();
217     EasyMock.expect(indexService.updateEventMetadata(eq(UPDATE_EVENT), capture(capturedMetadataList1), eq(elasticsearchIndex))).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
218 
219     /**
220      * Update event metadata external service mocking
221      */
222     capturedMetadataList2 = Capture.newInstance();
223     Event updateEventMetadata = new Event(METADATA_UPDATE_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
224     updateEventMetadata.setRecordingStartDate("2017-08-29T00:05:00.000Z");
225     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(METADATA_UPDATE_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(updateEventMetadata)).anyTimes();
226     EasyMock.expect(indexService.updateEventMetadata(eq(METADATA_UPDATE_EVENT), capture(capturedMetadataList2), eq(elasticsearchIndex))).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
227     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(updateEventMetadata)).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
228 
229     /**
230      * Update event track data
231      */
232     capturedMediaPackage = Capture.newInstance();
233     Event updateEventTrack = new Event(TRACK_UPDATE_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
234 
235     MediaPackageBuilder builder = MediaPackageBuilderFactory.newInstance().newMediaPackageBuilder();
236     URI uriMP = TestEventsEndpoint.class.getResource("/event-track-update-mediapackage.xml").toURI();
237     URI uriMPUpdated = TestEventsEndpoint.class.getResource("/event-track-update-mediapackage-updated.xml").toURI();
238     MediaPackage mp = builder.loadFromXml(uriMP.toURL().openStream());
239     MediaPackage mpUpdated = builder.loadFromXml(uriMPUpdated.toURL().openStream());
240 
241     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(TRACK_UPDATE_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(updateEventTrack)).anyTimes();
242     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(updateEventTrack)).andReturn(mp).anyTimes();
243     EasyMock.expect(ingestService.addTrack((InputStream) EasyMock.anyObject(), (String) EasyMock.anyObject(),
244             (MediaPackageElementFlavor) EasyMock.anyObject(), (MediaPackage) EasyMock.anyObject()))
245             .andReturn(mpUpdated);
246     EasyMock.expect(assetManager.takeSnapshot(EasyMock.capture(capturedMediaPackage))).andReturn(EasyMock.createNiceMock(Snapshot.class));
247     EasyMock.expect(workflowService.mediaPackageHasActiveWorkflows(mp.getIdentifier().toString())).andReturn(false).anyTimes();
248 
249     /**
250      * Get event metadata external service mocking
251      */
252     Event getEvent = new Event(METADATA_GET_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
253     getEvent.setRecordingStartDate("2017-08-29T00:05:00.000Z");
254     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(METADATA_GET_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(getEvent)).anyTimes();
255     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEventMediapackage(getEvent)).andReturn(null).anyTimes();
256 
257     /**
258      * Update event scheduling information external service mocking
259      */
260     final TechnicalMetadata technicalMetadata1 = new TechnicalMetadataImpl(
261         SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT,
262         "testAgent23",
263         Date.from(Instant.parse("2017-08-28T00:05:00Z")),
264         Date.from(Instant.parse("2017-08-28T00:07:00Z")),
265         null,
266         null,
267         Collections.singletonMap(CaptureParameters.CAPTURE_DEVICE_NAMES, "default1"),
268         Opt.none()
269     );
270     capturedStartDate = Capture.newInstance();
271     capturedEndDate = Capture.newInstance();
272     capturedAgentId = Capture.newInstance();
273     capturedAgentConfig = Capture.newInstance();
274     Event updateEventScheduling = new Event(SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
275     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(updateEventScheduling)).anyTimes();
276     EasyMock.expect(schedulerService.getTechnicalMetadata(SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT)).andReturn(technicalMetadata1).anyTimes();
277     schedulerService.updateEvent(
278         eq(SCHEDULING_UPDATE_EVENT),
279         capture(capturedStartDate),
280         capture(capturedEndDate),
281         capture(capturedAgentId),
282         eq(Opt.none()),
283         eq(Opt.none()),
284         eq(Opt.none()),
285         capture(capturedAgentConfig),
286         eq(false)
287     );
288     EasyMock.expectLastCall();
289 
290     /**
291      * Get event scheduling information external service mocking
292      */
293     final Event getEventScheduling = new Event(SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT, defaultOrg.getId());
294     final TechnicalMetadata technicalMetadata2 = new TechnicalMetadataImpl(
295         SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT,
296         "testAgent24",
297         Date.from(Instant.parse("2017-08-29T00:05:00Z")),
298         Date.from(Instant.parse("2017-08-29T00:07:00Z")),
299         null,
300         null,
301         Collections.singletonMap(CaptureParameters.CAPTURE_DEVICE_NAMES, "default1,default2"),
302         Opt.none()
303     );
304     EasyMock.expect(indexService.getEvent(SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT, elasticsearchIndex)).andReturn(Opt.some(getEventScheduling)).anyTimes();
305     EasyMock.expect(schedulerService.getTechnicalMetadata(SCHEDULING_GET_EVENT)).andReturn(technicalMetadata2).anyTimes();
306 
307 
308     // Replay all mocks
309     EasyMock.replay(deleteMetadataMP, indexService, schedulerService, ingestService, assetManager, workflowService, noPublicationsMP, twoPublicationsMP);
310 
311     setElasticsearchIndex(elasticsearchIndex);
312     setIndexService(indexService);
313     setSchedulerService(schedulerService);
314     setIngestService(ingestService);
315     setAssetManager(assetManager);
316     setWorkflowService(workflowService);
317     setupSecurityService();
318     Properties properties = new Properties();
319     properties.load(getClass().getResourceAsStream("/events-endpoint.properties"));
320     updated((Hashtable) properties);
321   }
322 
323   public static Capture<MetadataList> getCapturedMetadataList1() {
324     return capturedMetadataList1;
325   }
326 
327   public static Capture<MetadataList> getCapturedMetadataList2() {
328     return capturedMetadataList2;
329   }
330 
331   public static Capture<Opt<Date>> getCapturedStartDate() {
332     return capturedStartDate;
333   }
334 
335   public static Capture<Opt<Date>> getCapturedEndDate() {
336     return capturedEndDate;
337   }
338 
339   public static Capture<Opt<String>> getCapturedAgentId() {
340     return capturedAgentId;
341   }
342 
343   public static Capture<Opt<Map<String, String>>> getCapturedAgentConfig() {
344     return capturedAgentConfig;
345   }
346 
347   public static Capture<MediaPackage> getCapturedMediaPackage() {
348     return capturedMediaPackage;
349   }
350 }
